about_the_game:
Introduction:

It has become a habit for a streamer to update the video without time. This streamer is not enterprising every day and is addicted to entertainment. Suddenly one day, when the streamer woke up, everything around had changed, and all the sins would be liquidated at this moment.

What is the reason for all those things? Who is the creator of this dungeon? Where did the endless blades come from?

These questions waiting for you to find out.

Operation:

This game is a horizontal platform game, players can use the "↑, ↓, ←, →" button to control the character movement.

At the final battle, player can press the "Z" key to use additional capabilities.

Production Team:

If you like this game or want to know more, please pay attention to the Bilibili ID: 亚里士卡戎

Here special thanks to CV: 花子缎（微博：@花子缎-话梅糖）

And CV's dubbing club : （微博：@一颗话梅糖配音社）

Of course, if anyone has the intention to cooperate with the game can also contact the game author, I hope everyone has a good game experience.

name: 愚者地牢-UP主的消失

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
